dialogText: You there, stop! You're no figment...$In fact, you're not from this world at all, are you?$Ah, now I see. So you're the one that made such a mess of this world.$Well, since it's you're fault, guess what pal? You get to help me fix it.$Start by going over to that oven and pressing 'E'. $You're gonna banish that object from this world for me.
